episodes.title: ROB HERSOV & THE TRUTH REPORTERS : South Africa’s Political Cults Are Collapsing
episodes.description:
South Africa’s Political Cults Are Crumbling — And a New Battle Is Coming

The ANC is in ICU. MK is collapsing under its own weight. The EFF has hit a ceiling. And a new fight is emerging between the DA, the Patriotic Alliance, and the IFP for South Africa’s next chapter.

In this explosive Truth Report roundtable, Rob Hersov, Renaldo Gouws, Sama Sambit, and Kuhle Maseko unpack the political freefall:
– Why MK is a cult built on loyalty, not leadership.
– How the ANC’s old guard has become a “government of dependents.”
– Why Gayton McKenzie’s PA could be the next national disruptor.
– And why “making capitalism fashionable again” might be South Africa’s only way out.

From the rise of federalism to the death of political messiahs, this is one of the boldest Truth Report debates yet.

Watch the full conversation. Leave your prediction in the comments: Who wins South Africa’s final battle — the DA, the ANC, or something new?
